name: Simulacrum (itch)
description:
Create copies of yourself in order to reach new heights! But be careful you don't wall yourself into a corner!

Made during 48 hour Game Jam at Full Sail University.

Programmers:

Conor Maloney -Michael Sciortino - Luis Garcia - Jeffrey Lamas

Visual Artists:

Jason Ardelean - Monique Jachens

Sound/Music:

Max Gromann

Rigging:

Alma Cuevas
